body_html:
@jart To make things easier for bdilday here are some screenshots:

(The bottom chart is in log mode).

The lack of a top line on the log plot is a bit weird, but really a manifestation of a different issue.

N.b. the screenshots are with my proposed changes, ie. the icons are reversed so that it shows the current state of the chart.

body:
@jart To make things easier for bdilday here are some screenshots: 
![image](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/1400023/17786421/958f8006-6539-11e6-827e-ae8511d96254.png)

(The bottom chart is in log mode).

The lack of a top line on the log plot is a bit weird, but really a manifestation of a different issue.

N.b. the screenshots are with my proposed changes, ie. the icons are reversed so that it shows the current state of the chart.
